text: Phillip LaDon Phillips Jr. (born September 20, 1990) is an American singer, songwriter and actor. He won the eleventh season of American Idol on May 23, 2012. His coronation song, "Home", became the best-selling song in American Idol history. He has released three studio albums. Phillips was born in Albany, Georgia. He is married to Hannah Blackwell. The couple have a child. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American folk singers Category:American Idol winners Category:American pop singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American television actors Category:People from Albany, Georgia Category:Singers from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Phillip Phillips
